name: Jinn (Artifact)
description: A small, portable container ("bottle") for a semi-organic brain. At TL R bottles have antimatter power and efficient life support systems, allowing a brain to survive for long periods of time before requiring a recharge. The most common Jinns have psionic brains installed (for example, with Teleport skill), which can act without requiring a body.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
